p: The tested honeys (excluding olive honey) at both 1.0% and 2.0% ( w/ v) activated AMPKÎ± but the expression levels of this gene varied, depending on honey type and concentration ( Figure 6). In addition, all tested honeys at 1.0% induced HMGCR gene expression to the level close to the control, indicating that the honeys modulated HMGCR gene expression against the analogue (3.9-fold change compared to control).
